skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily dose
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Want to learn a new language the fast, fun, and easy way? 
With Daily Dose, you can learn 34 languages and start speaking from the very first lesson.

Study with eight-minute audio lessons by real teachers. 
Just minutes a day is all you need for your journey to fluency.

For those who want to accelerate their learning, upgrade to Premium!

With Premium, you’ll build your fluency with:
- Lesson Breakdown: In-depth explanations of vocabulary, grammar, and culture.
- Printable Lesson Notes: Get lesson note PDFs by email. Read the full lesson transcript, translations, grammar breakdowns, and vocabulary list.

How does Daily Dose work?
Listen to a short dialogue using real-life language. Break down the dialogue line-by-line and get every word and grammar point explained. Practice your speaking and listening skills while you cook, clean, or lay in bed!

How to activate
Launch the app by saying “Alexa, open Daily Dose.” Choose from 34 languages, select your learning level and start!

With each language, you get
- 100 audio lessons
- 25 lessons across four levels from Absolute Beginner to Advanced

When you’re done with all 25 lessons in a level, Daily Dose automatically graduates you to the next level.

Choose from 34 languages: Spanish, French, German, Italian, Chinese, Hebrew, Russian, Japanese, Korean, English, Afrikaans, Arabic. Bulgarian, Cantonese, Czech, Danish, Filipino, Finnish, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Swahili, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Urdu or Vietnamese.
